title: Delta Theory
description: A minimal, domain-agnostic ontology for how differences become structure, propagate, and stabilize across domains. Uses a dual-register approach balancing technical precision with humane meaning. Includes the five kernel invariants (ε, π, e, φ, c) and the SVA modulators (∇S, λV, ψA). Repository contains conceptual notes, structure, and documentation (not software).

related_identifiers.title: Fractal Relational Ontology of Noetic Transcendency — Difference as Ontological Ground

notes: Repository release v0.2.1. Use GitHub releases to mint a new Zenodo record; this file pre-sets metadata.
